title: Statement by the Press Secretary | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
October 18, 2010

 



Statement by the Press Secretary





	On Monday, October 18, 2010, the President signed into law:
	 
	S. 3802, the “Mount Stevens and Ted Stevens Icefield Designation Act,” which designates a mountain and icefield in the State of Alaska as “Mount Stevens” and the “Ted Stevens Icefield,” respectively, in honor of Senator Ted Stevens.
